chunk:
Anokha Lotus & Lychee Facial Crème

Brand: Anokha

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: aqua (water), Helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, Prunus domestica (plum) seed oil, glycerin, cetearyl olivate, sorbitan olivate, Nelumbo nucifera (lotus) flower extract, xanthan gum, Litchi chinensis (lychee) fruit extract, Centella asiatica

t, Centella asiatica (gotu kola) extract, Sambucus nigra (elderberry) fruit extract, tocopherol (vitamin E), Cananga odorata (ylang ylang) flower oil, gluconolactone, sodium benzoate, citric acid, sodium hydroxide, linalool*, geraniol*, benzyl benzoate*, farnesol*, benzyl salicylate*, isoeugenol, eugenol

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immu
GH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
